actions.committee: House Committee on Science and Technology
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Science and Technology.

official_title: Concurrent resolution pertaining to the methods used on animals in research.

summary.text: Declares it the sense of Congress that the Federal Government should develop research methods which complement or eliminate current methods involving the use of animals and that no Federal funds should be granted for research projects involving the use of animals if other methods can be successfully substituted.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution pertaining to the methods used on animals in research.
